Package ca.islandora.alpaca.connector.derivative

Class RequestConfigConfigurer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.islandora.alpaca.connector.derivative.RequestConfigConfigurer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.camel.component.http4.HttpClientConfigurer
    public class RequestConfigConfigurer
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.camel.component.http4.HttpClientConfigurer
    Provides a default HttpClient RequestConfig with custom values for connection request, connect, and socket timeout values. Custom values must be set on this class prior to invoking configureHttpClient(HttpClientBuilder).

    • Method Detail

      • configureHttpClient

        public void configureHttpClient​(org.apache.http.impl.client.HttpClientBuilder clientBuilder)
        Creates a RequestConfig using custom values for connectionRequestTimeout, connectTimeout, and socketTimeout. If custom values are not provided by this class, then the default values from RequestConfig.DEFAULT are used.
        Specified by:
        configureHttpClient in interface org.apache.camel.component.http4.HttpClientConfigurer
        Parameters:
        clientBuilder - the HttpClientBuilder
        See Also:
        setConnectionRequestTimeoutMs(int), setConnectTimeoutMs(int), setSocketTimeoutMs(int)
